physical_examinations.relevant_findings: At 2.4 yr, height was decreased; at 2.7 yr after transplantation, growth appeared to increase with normal IGF-I levels.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially, the patient's length SDS decreased from -1.0 to -2.0 during the first year of life; a more rapid decrease was noted to -4.1 at 2.4 yr. After stem cell transplantation, height at 2.7 yr was noted as -3.7 SDS, indicating improvement in growth.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Baseline IGF-I was low at -3.2 SDS, IGFBP-3 also low. GH secretion was brisk with peak GH levels of 70 mU/liter.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Height: -4.4 SDS, BMI SDS: -1.1, Bone age: 1.3 yr.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: After stem cell transplantation, highlighted improvement in metabolic parameters, plasma IGF-I was normal, and height showed an increase at 2.7 yr.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: There was a significant improvement noted in growth velocity after transplantation, contrasting with earlier growth failure.
